additional_info:
Inventory, Furniture, Technique, Storeroom, Telephone, Internet, Network, Cable-TV, Kitchen, Window guards, corner, Heating - Conditioning, Hot water: gas 
 For sale is working bar in an ideal location in the heart of Tbilisi, Perovskaya str, near the Concert Hall. The bar has been operating since 1996. It is fully furnished and equipped. The draft beer equipment installed by the representatives of the Irish company “Guinness” makes the taste of our beer even more  popular. The bar has a total area of 80 sq.m, including the seating area of 50 sq.m. It has two entrances, a kitchen with all the needed cooking appliances, two storage areas and W.C. The price also includes all the equipment and fixtures owned by the bar and the inventory (on the day of sale).
557940366 Maria e-mail:mariam.bona@gmail.com

details.address: Tbilisi, Old Tbilisi,  Vera, G. Akhvlediani st.
